name: Fabulous Fudge Chocolate Cake
author: Charmaine Brooks
summary: This is my favorite chocolate cake recipe because of the moist texture and rich, dark chocolate flavor.  Enjoy!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt
In a large bowl, beat 1/2 cup butter or margarine and 2 1/2 cups brown sugar until well mixed
Add eggs one at a time
Beat in the vanilla and melted chocolate squares
Add 1/2 the sour cream and then 1/2 the dry ingredients to the butter mixture until well blended
Add the remaining sour cream and dry ingredients to the batter
Bake in a greased 9 X 13 inch pan for 35 minutes
To Make Caramel Icing:   First melt 1/2 cup butter in a saucepan
Stir in 1 cup brown sugar and boil  about 2 minutes
Stir in 1/4 cup milk and bring to a boil
Place pan in cold water and stir in the confectioners' sugar
